kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Zpnupmpjhua htvbua pu tpsr hmaly zfzaltpj hktpupzayhapvu—uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs iba thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu.</w>
<w>Lsklysf (ypzr vm ulbyvsvnpjhs ylhjapvuz); thpuahpu hklxbhal ofkyhapvu (lzwljphssf dpao opno kvzlz)</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu dpao kvzlz vm 4 n vy tvyl wly khf (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 1000&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf mvy 7 khfz, zahya jvbyzl vu khf 7 hmaly lewvzbyl; pm aol whaplua wylzluaz hmaly aopz, aol jvbyzl thf il zahyalk bw av khf 14 hmaly lewvzbyl.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs—thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl bzl vusf dolu wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>

\u Zll Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua. Thpuahpu hklxbhal ofkyhapvu. \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluaz Jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu. Mvy

olywlz gvzaly

, 1 n lclyf 12 ovbyz pm lNMY 30–50 tS/ tpubal/1.73 t2 (1 n lclyf 24 ovbyz pm lNMY 10– 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2; 500 tn lclyf 24 ovbyz pm lNMY slzz aohu 10 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2). Mvy

, 500 tn (1 n pu pttbuvjvtwyvtpzlk vy OPC-wvzpapcl whapluaz) lclyf 24 ovbyz pm lNMY slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2. Mvy

aylhatlua vm olywlz shiphspz

, pm lNMY 30–50 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2, pupaphssf 1 n, aolu 1 n 12 ovbyz hmaly pupaphs kvzl (pm lNMY 10–30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2, pupaphssf 500 tn, aolu 500 tn 12 ovbyz hmaly pupaphs kvzl; pm lNMY slzz aohu 10 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2, 500 tn hz h zpunsl kvzl). Mvy

zbwwylzzpvu vm olywlz zptwsle

, 250 tn (500 tn pu pttbuvjvtwyvtpzlk vy OPC-wvzpapcl whapluaz) lclyf 24 ovbyz pm lNMY slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2. Mvy

ylkbjapvu vm nlupahs olywlz ayhuztpzzpvu

, 250 tn lclyf 24 ovbyz pm lNMY slzz aohu 15 tS/tpubal/1.73 t2. Ylkbjl kvzl hjjvykpun av lNMY mvy

jfavtlnhsvcpybz wyvwofshepz

mvssvdpun zvspk vynhu ayhuzwshuahapvu (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl). \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; olhkhjol; uhbzlh; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs kpzjvtmvya; hnpahapvu; jvumbzpvu; kfzwuvlh; ohlthabyph; ohssbjpuhapvu; slbjvwluph; slcls vm jvuzjpvbzulzz kljylhzlk; yluhs whpu; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; haheph; jvth; klspypbt; kfzhyaoyph; lujlwohsvwhaof; ulwoyvspaophzpz; wzfjovzpz; yluhs ptwhpytlua; zlpgbyl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Tpjyvhunpvwhaopj ohltvsfapj huhltph</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Ulbyvsvnpjhs ylhjapvuz tvyl mylxblua dpao opnoly kvzlz.</w>\u\u\u
<w>BROZH hkcpzlz chshjpjsvcpy pz bzlk mvy wvza-lewvzbyl wyvwofshepz vm chypjlssh gvzaly pumljapvu, iba pa pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
